unnormalised: **Traffic Chaos, No More? New Rules Hit Mumbai Streets!**
normalised: **Traffic Chaos, No More? New Rules Hit Mumbai Streets!**

unnormalised: Mumbai's notorious traffic is about to face a serious regulatory shakeup! The Transport Department, headed by Dr. Patil, just announced a slew of new traffic regulations aimed at easing congestion.
normalised: Mumbai's notorious traffic is about to face a serious regulatory shakeup! The Transport Department, headed by Doctor Patil, just announced a slew of new traffic regulations aimed at easing congestion.

unnormalised: Expect stricter enforcement on haphazard parking, especially around hotspots like Dadar and Bandra. Fines are going up – think Rs. 2000 for repeated offenses.
normalised: Expect stricter enforcement on haphazard parking, especially around hotspots like Dadar and Bandra. Fines are going up – think rupee two thousand for repeated offenses.

unnormalised: They're also piloting a 'smart traffic' system on the Western Express Highway, promising real-time adjustments based on traffic flow.
normalised: They're also piloting a 'smart traffic' system on the Western Express Highway, promising real-time adjustments based on traffic flow.

unnormalised: Plus, autorickshaws will now have designated zones for pickups and drops – say goodbye to random stops in the middle of the road!
normalised: Plus, autorickshaws will now have designated zones for pickups and drops – say goodbye to random stops in the middle of the road!

unnormalised: "We need discipline, bhai," said Inspector Sharma at a press conference. "Think of it as a 'Swachh Traffic Abhiyan'."
normalised: "We need discipline, bhai," said Inspector Sharma at a press conference. "Think of it as a 'Swachh Traffic Abhiyan'."

unnormalised: Areas near schools like the J.B. Petit High School are also getting increased no-honking zones and pedestrian crossings.
normalised: Areas near schools like the J B Petit High School are also getting increased no-honking zones and pedestrian crossings.

unnormalised: The BMC is even considering acquiring land to create more parking spaces, targeting areas measuring at least 5000 sq ft near railway stations. This could actually change something! Fingers crossed!
normalised: The B M C is even considering acquiring land to create more parking spaces, targeting areas measuring at least five thousand square feet near railway stations. This could actually change something! Fingers crossed!
